Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1024 Curb Cuts

1024.01Permit required; bond. 1024.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Driving upon curbs - see TRAF. 432.22

Excavations - see S.U. & P.S. Ch. 1022

Subdivision design standards for curbs - see P. & Z. 1248.07

Marking of building numbers on curbs - see B. & H. 1460.01
